body:
Every server seems to be working exept Acivus... did they change there ip??

IP that I am using: wallsmc.com

Is this the correct IP? I've been using the same one for years know and I just want to know if it has been changed.

title: Server IP

replies.body: Yeah, Avicus changed IP's from wallsmc.co/play.mczone.co/skywars.co to avic.us for 1.8 and 1.9.
